text: 13.5 Sav 8.2, 1 Pi 2.19 Anɨb ak tek, nɨbi gapman bɨawl muk okok mɨdɨl, agɨnɨgel tek nɨgɨnɨmɨb. Nɨbi pen kɨlop muk okok ma mɨdon nɨm, chɨnop gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨgel agɨl, gos anɨb ak nep nɨŋɨd ma pɨlɨkɨnɨmɨb. Mel. God ne nɨbi gɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨmɨb agɨl gos nɨgek, nɨbi gos anɨb ak abe nɨŋɨd, gapman bɨawl muk okok mɨdɨl, agɨnɨgel tek nɨgɨnɨmɨb.
